```{r}
library(labelled)
library(gtsummary)
library(dplyr)
library(here)

data <- read.csv("C:/MPH/SPRING_2024/DATA550/midterm/data550midterm/data/covid_sub.csv", header = TRUE)

#labeling the study variables
var_label(finaldata) <- list(
  AGE = "age of the patient",
  SEX = "sex of the patient",
  PREGNANT = "pregnancy Status",
  PATIENT_TYPE = "Hospitalized or not",
  COPD = "Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease",
  DIABETES = "Diabetes"
)

##decriptive statistics table
data |>
  select("AGE", "SEX", "PREGNANT", "PATIENT_TYPE", "COPD", "DIABETES") |>
  tbl_summary(by = "PATIENT_TYPE") |>
  modify_spanning_header(c("stat_1", "stat_2") ~ "**Descriptive Statistics**") |>
  add_overall()|>
  add_p()

```
